root.name: Darkstalkers Resurrection
root.description: OverviewDarkstalkers Ressurection was produced by Iron Galaxy Studios, who have worked with original developer of the Darkstalkers games, Capcom, in the past. As with their previous work with the developer, Darkstalkers Resurrection contains downloadable concept art for the games, GGPO online play, and other features. The game received a digital release in western markets, but is only available as a disc release in Japan.
